Package com.google.caliper.runner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CaliperRun
    A single invocation of caliper.
    ExperimentSelector  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllocationInstrument
    Instrument that watches the memory allocations in an invocation of the benchmark method and reports some statistic.
    ArbitraryMeasurementInstrument
    Instrument for taking an arbitrary measurement.
    BenchmarkClassModule
    Binds objects related to a benchmark class.
    CaliperMain
    Primary entry point for the caliper benchmark runner application; run with --help for details.
    ExperimentingCaliperRun
    An execution of each Experiment for the configured number of trials.
    ExperimentModule
    A module that binds data specific to a single experiment.
    FullCartesianExperimentSelector
    A set of experiments constructed by taking all possible combinations of instruments, benchmark methods, user parameters, VM specs and VM arguments.
    HttpUploader
    A ResultProcessor implementation that publishes results to the webapp using an HTTP request.
    Instrument  
    Parameter
    Represents an injectable parameter, marked with one of @Param, @VmParam.
    ParameterSet
    Represents all the injectable parameter fields of a single kind (@Param or @VmParam) found in a benchmark class.
    Running
    A collection of annotations for bindings pertaining to the currently running experiment.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidBenchmarkException  
    InvalidInstrumentException  
    UserCodeException
    Signifies that the user's benchmark code threw an exception.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Running.AfterExperimentMethods  
    Running.BeforeExperimentMethods  
    Running.Benchmark  
    Running.BenchmarkClass  
    Running.BenchmarkMethod
